title: Idle Town Billionaire

headings.text: How to Play Idle Town Billionaire

controls: On Computers: Click to invest and upgrade businesses.On Mobiles: Tap to interact with businesses and manage your town.
content.howToPlay: Begin with a single business and generate income by tapping. Each tap earns money, which you can use to reinvest in your town.Hire a manager for your business to collect profits automatically. Without a manager, you'll need to tap regularly to gather income.Use your earnings to unlock and buy new buildings like a pet store, apartment complex, pizzeria, and more. Each new business adds to your total income stream.Every new building requires its own manager for automation. If you don't hire one, you'll need to manually collect profits by clicking on each business.Invest in business upgrades to increase revenue and make your managers more efficient. Upgrades boost income rates and reduce collection times.As you accumulate wealth, you can unlock additional land in the town. But that's not all because you can venture into neighboring towns to expand your empire even further.There are five towns to unlock, each with rising land costs. Plan your investments wisely to expand strategically and dominate the business world.Keep upgrading, hiring, and strategizing to maximize earnings and build the ultimate business empire. Will you become the richest idle town billionaire?

fullContent: Homeâ€º TycoonIdle Town BillionaireBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenIdle Town Billionaire is a clicker game where you start as a small-town entrepreneur and work your way up to becoming a business tycoon. Tap or click to invest in businesses, buy and upgrade shops, hire building managers and expand your empire. Watch your town grow as you generate income even while you're away, unlock new towns, and automate your earnings. Can you build the ultimate billionaire town? And if you have that tycoon spirit, you might like other idle games like Idle Vlogger, where you get to be a YouTuber and grow your channel slowly.
